content.label: DL Advance API
content.overview: The DL Advance API retrieves driving license details using DL number and DOB. It provides personal info, address, validity, vehicle class, and supports KYC and compliance checks.

content.label: Voter ID API
content.overview: The Voter ID API verifies and fetches voter details using the voter ID number. It provides personal info, constituency, booth, and location data for identity verification and compliance.

content.label: Check PAN-Aadhaar Link Status
content.overview: This API checks whether a given PAN is linked to a specific Aadhaar number. Useful for compliance verification, KYC processes, and identity validation.

content.label: PAN Verification API
content.overview: This API validates an individual’s or entity’s PAN in real-time, helping businesses ensure compliance, prevent fraud, and simplify onboarding.

content.label: Identity Match API
content.overview: Fetch identity details including name, email, phone, gender, DOB, Aadhaar linkage, and address.

content.label: PAN Advance v2
content.overview: Fetches additional attributes: Father name, Aadhaar linkage, masked Aadhaar, DOB, gender.

content.label: PAN Comprehensive Verification API
content.overview: This API fetches comprehensive details of a PAN holder, including identity, address, Aadhaar linkage, and father's name. It is useful for KYC, onboarding, and identity verification processes.

content.label: Complete Profile
content.overview: Pulls a full profile including name, DOB, father name, Aadhaar link, address, contact details.

content.label: Demographic Data Fetch
content.overview: This API retrieves demographic information linked to a PAN, such as address, state, and pincode. It supports KYC, identity verification, and customer onboarding processes.

content.label: PAN Validate
content.overview: Quick check if a PAN is valid, invalid, or inactive.

content.label: Demographic Advance
content.overview: This API provides extended demographic information linked to a PAN, including multiple addresses if available. It is useful for thorough identity checks, KYC, and compliance workflows.

content.apiName: PAN to Father’s Name Lookup API
content.label: Father Name Lookup
content.overview: This API retrieves the father’s name linked to a PAN, enabling businesses and institutions to verify identity details, support KYC processes, enhance onboarding accuracy, and reduce fraud risks efficiently.

content.apiName: PAN to Name & DOB Lookup API
content.label: Name & DOB Lookup
content.overview: This API fetches a PAN holder’s name and date of birth, useful for identity verification, KYC compliance, and streamlining customer onboarding.

content.label: PAN to Account Linkage
content.overview: This API checks if a PAN is linked to a bank account using the account number and IFSC, helping verify ownership and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.

content.label: Occupation API
content.overview: This API fetches occupation-related details of a PAN holder, including employment type, directorship, or sole proprietor status, useful for KYC, compliance checks, and financial due diligence.

content.label: PAN v1
content.overview: This API verifies a PAN and fetches the holder’s name, gender, date of birth, Aadhaar linkage status, and category for KYC and compliance purposes.

content.label: LPG Verification by Mobile Number
content.overview: This API verifies LPG consumer details (Indane, HP, Bharat Gas) using a registered mobile number and returns linked consumer, distributor, and connection information for validation and compliance.

content.label: Challan API
content.overview: This API retrieves vehicle challan details, including challan number, status, date, location, offenses, accused information, and related document URLs, useful for compliance checks and traffic violation tracking.

content.label: Company CIN Lookup V1
content.overview: Retrieves company details and key personnel information using the Corporate Identification Number (CIN).

content.label: CIN Lookup Advanced API
content.overview: Enhanced CIN lookup providing company information, directors, associations, and compliance details.

content.label: PAN to CIN Lookup
content.overview: Retrieves the list of CIN numbers and corresponding company names associated with a given PAN number. Supports compliance and corporate verification use cases.

content.label: Verify and Fetch GSTIN Details
content.overview: This API verifies a taxpayer or business using their GSTIN and returns details such as legal name, trade name, status, taxpayer type, and registration information. Useful for compliance checks and business verification.

content.label: Fetch Legal and Trade Name from GSTIN
content.overview: This API fetches the legal and trade name of a taxpayer or business using their GSTIN. Useful for quick identity verification, invoicing, and compliance checks.

content.label: Fetch HSN Codes from GSTIN
content.overview: This API provides HSN codes and their descriptions associated with a business using its GSTIN. Useful for validating goods/services classification for compliance, invoicing, and tax reporting.

content.label: Fetch GSTINs Linked to PAN
content.overview: This API retrieves all GSTINs linked to a given PAN, including their status (Active/Inactive) and state codes. Useful for compliance checks, onboarding, and validating GST registrations associated with a PAN.

content.label: Fetch HSN/SAC Details
content.overview: This API retrieves details of goods or services using an HSN/SAC code, including title, description, type, and related trade info. Useful for tax classification, invoicing, and compliance reporting.

content.label: PAN to Udyam
content.overview: Verifies if a PAN number is linked with a registered Udyam (MSME) certificate and fetches associated business details.

content.label: 206AB Check
content.overview: Checks whether a PAN falls under Section 206AB for higher TDS deduction applicability.

content.label: UDIN Verification
content.overview: Verifies ICAI-issued UDINs to ensure authenticity of documents certified by Chartered Accountants.

content.label: Bank Account Verification
content.overview: Verifies ownership of a bank account by initiating a minimal transaction (Penny Drop). Validates account number, IFSC, and holder details.

content.label: Bank Account Verification
content.overview: Validates bank account ownership without performing any transaction. Verifies account number, IFSC, and holder name instantly.

content.label: RC Verification
content.overview: The RC Advance API provides detailed vehicle registration information, including ownership details, insurance, hypothecation, PUCC, and registration validity.

content.label: RC Verification
content.overview: The RC Advance V3 API provides the latest and most detailed RC data, including personal, registration, vehicle, finance, taxation, insurance, permit, dealer, and sale details.

content.label: RC Verification
content.overview: The RC Advance V2 API fetches extended vehicle details including owner, registration, insurance, fitness, finance, challans, and pollution certificate information using vehicle number and chassis number.

content.label: Vehicle RC V2 API
content.overview: The RC (Registration Certificate) V2 API provides detailed information about a vehicle based on its registration number. It returns ownership details, registration validity, insurance, permit, and technical specifications such as engine, chassis, dimensions, and manufacturer details.

content.label: Fetch Registration Number by Chassis
content.overview: This API fetches registration number details based on the provided chassis number. It provides a minimal response containing only the registration number.

content.label: Fetch Registration Number by Chassis (v2)
content.overview: This API fetches registration number details based on the provided chassis number (version 2). It improves error handling compared to v1.

content.apiName: Chassis to RC Advance V1 API
content.label: Fetch Detailed Vehicle Information by Chassis
content.overview: This API fetches detailed vehicle, ownership, insurance, permit, pollution, tax, and status information using the chassis number.

content.label: Fetch Detailed Vehicle Information by Chassis (v2)
content.overview: This is the enhanced version of Chassis to RC Advance API. It fetches detailed vehicle, ownership, insurance, permit, tax, pollution, and status details with improved error handling.

content.label: Fastag API
content.overview: This API provides Fastag details of a vehicle, including tag identifiers, status, issue date, issuing bank, and associated vehicle details.

content.label: Vehicle Tax Payment Details
content.overview: This API provides vehicle tax payment details for a given transaction ID, including vehicle info, payment info, and payment status.

content.label: Lookup Basics API
content.overview: The Lookup Basics API retrieves the basic telecom information of a mobile number including operator type (prepaid/postpaid), service provider, and telecom circle (region).

content.label: Telco Lookup Advanced
content.overview: The Lookup Advanced API fetches detailed telecom information including roaming/porting status, delivery status, number info, current/original operator details, and porting history.

content.apiName: Telco Advance (OTP Based, Send OTP) API
content.label: Telco Send OTP API
content.overview: The Telco OTP API allows initiating an OTP request to verify ownership of a mobile number.

content.apiName: Telco Advance (OTP Based, Verify OTP) API
content.label: Telco Verify OTP API
content.overview: The Verify OTP API confirms whether the OTP sent to a mobile number is correct and retrieves KYC details like name, DOB, address, operator, and plan type.

content.apiName: Gujarat Land Verification - District List API
content.label: Fetch Gujarat District List
content.overview: This API provides the list of districts in Gujarat for land verification purposes. It is the first step in fetching hierarchical land details such as taluka, village, and block information.

content.apiName: Gujarat Land Verification - Taluka List API
content.label: Fetch Taluka List by District
content.overview: This API provides the list of talukas in a specified district of Gujarat for land verification purposes.

content.apiName: Gujarat Land Verification - Village List API
content.label: Fetch Village List by District and Taluka
content.overview: This API provides the list of villages in a specified taluka of a district in Gujarat for land verification purposes.

content.apiName: Gujarat Land Verification - Block List API
content.label: Fetch Block List by District, Taluka, and Village
content.overview: This API provides the list of blocks in a specified village of a taluka in Gujarat for land verification purposes.

content.apiName: Gujarat Land Verification - Owner Verification API
content.label: Verify Land Ownership by Details
content.overview: This API allows verification of land ownership in Gujarat based on district, taluka, village, block, and owner name against government records.

content.apiName: MP Land Verification - District List API
content.label: Fetch MP District List
content.overview: This API provides the list of districts in Madhya Pradesh for land verification purposes.

content.apiName: MP Land Verification - Tehsil List API
content.label: Fetch Tehsil List by District
content.overview: This API provides the list of tehsils (talukas) in a specified district of Madhya Pradesh for land verification purposes.

content.apiName: MP Land Verification - Village List API
content.label: Fetch Village List by District and Tehsil
content.overview: This API provides the list of villages in a specified tehsil of a district in Madhya Pradesh for land verification purposes.

content.apiName: MP Land Verification - Khasra List API
content.label: Fetch Khasra List by District, Tehsil, and Village
content.overview: This API provides the list of khasra numbers in a specified village of a tehsil in Madhya Pradesh for land verification purposes.

content.apiName: MP Land Verification - Owner Verification API
content.label: Verify Land Ownership by Khasra Number
content.overview: This API allows verification of land ownership in Madhya Pradesh based on district, tehsil, village, and khasra number against government records.

content.apiName: Karnataka Land Verification - District List API
content.label: Fetch Karnataka District List
content.overview: This API provides the complete list of districts in Karnataka. It is the entry point for land verification queries, as district selection is required to drill down further into blocks, talukas, and zones.

content.apiName: Karnataka Land Verification - Block List API
content.label: Fetch Block List by District
content.overview: This API provides the list of blocks in a specified district of Karnataka for land verification purposes.

content.apiName: Karnataka Land Verification - Owner Verification API
content.label: Fetch Land Ownership Details
content.overview: This API provides detailed ownership and land parcel information for locations in Karnataka. It includes khata number, owner details, land area, tax information, and more.
